thread.title: John Boyega and Mark Hamill troll 'Star Wars' fans with hilarious Twitter exchange
thread.title_full: John Boyega and Mark Hamill troll 'Star Wars' fans with hilarious Twitter exchange

author: Sam Haysom
title: John Boyega and Mark Hamill troll 'Star Wars' fans with hilarious Twitter exchange
text:
When it comes to gleefully trolling Star Wars fans with potential spoilers, Mark Hamill is a force to be reckoned with.
SEE ALSO: Mark Hamill shared 'perhaps the very first' photo of Luke Skywalker and it's a real nostalgia trip 
Remember his birthday tweet to John Boyega last year, where he referred to Boyega as "sonsational", then followed it up with: "Typo or spoiler? YOU decide"? 
Well, this year he's at it again.
On Friday, Hamill tagged his young co-star in the following tweet:
Shout-out to @JohnBoyega for no reason other than being wickedly-proficient w/ a lightsaber w/ no training whatsoever. You do me proud, son! pic.twitter.com/xeCFbzA9ph 
â€” Mark Hamill (@HamillHimself) March 17, 2017 
As always, Boyega was more than happy to play along.
Late response because I'm in Beijing but thanks dad @HamillHimself 
â€” John Boyega (@JohnBoyega) March 19, 2017 
And â€” again, as always â€” Twitter went wild.
@JohnBoyega @HamillHimself Finn Skywalker confirmed
â€” DevinðŸ’« (@ahsokaxtanos) March 19, 2017 
@JohnBoyega @HamillHimself "Thanks dad" ðŸ¤” pic.twitter.com/xBMcckvoHl 
â€” Gime Insua (@gimeinsuaof) March 19, 2017 
@JohnBoyega @HamillHimself 
finn skywalker!! pic.twitter.com/FHrLeS0MXo 
â€” Traitor Finn (@realtraitorfinn) March 19, 2017 
@JohnBoyega @HamillHimself u wot mate!? pic.twitter.com/WfBVUjtjwQ 
â€” dat dood (@AlexWHMiller) March 19, 2017 
The best bit? Definitely Hamill's response.
Kids! They never call, they never write & the excuses just get more elaborate- "I'm in Beijing" Yeah, right & I'm on a date w/ Beyonce-LOL! https://t.co/ekaF9IiXid 
â€” Mark Hamill (@HamillHimself) March 19, 2017 
Classic Hamill.
